title: Is Drake Maye ready for prime time? Sunday night will be his first real chance to show it.

title: Body from unsolved 1974 murder exhumed from North Shore cemetery
author: Madison Lucchesi
bullets: Crime “What happened to Henry has never left this town.
" Henry Bedard, and the baseball bat that was found at the scene.
Swampscott Police Department A body was exhumed Wednesday from a cemetery in relation to the unsolved murder of a 15-year-old Swampscott boy in 1974.

title: Here are the initial prices for Boston World Cup tickets at Gillette Stadium
author: Hayden Bird
bullets: Sports News The first tickets went on sale for those who were chosen in FIFA's Visa presale draw.
The FIFA World Cup Boston 2026 logo on display at Gillette Stadium in June.

Danielle Parhizkaran/Globe Staff By Hayden Bird October 2, 2025 | 2:16 PM 2 minutes to read After prolonged speculation, fans are starting to get a glimpse at what the cost of attending world soccer’s most celebrated event will be when it returns to North America in 2026.

title: Buffalo Bills to debut their ‘Cold Front’ uniforms Sunday night against the Patriots
author: Aidan Buchanan
bullets: New England Patriots "The city's DNA stitched into fabric.
" Bills vs Patriots on January 5, 2025 (Barry Chin/Globe Staff).
The Buffalo Bills are hoping for an early winter as they give fans a first look at their new “Cold Front” uniforms this Sunday against the Patriots.

title: South Boston rooftop bar closes months after opening citing ‘opposition from neighbors’
author: Katelyn Umholtz
bullets: Food The restaurant and rooftop bar management announced they were closed “for the foreseeable future.
” The Essex Restaurant and Essex Rooftop is closed "for the foreseeable future.

" Christopher Muther/Boston Globe A rooftop bar and restaurant inside a South Boston hotel has closed after only a few months of being open, citing residential complaints as the reason for shuttering.

title: New poll shows Moulton with lead over Markey in potential Senate primary
author: Ross Cristantiello
bullets: Politics Sen.
Ed Markey will be 80 on election day and is seeking another six-year term.
He could face significant primary challenges from Reps.
